title: Destinations
description: Explore some of my favorite travel destinations.

destinations.name: Kyoto, Japan
destinations.description: Discover the ancient temples, traditional tea houses, and serene gardens of Kyoto, a city rich in history and culture.

destinations.name: Santorini, Greece
destinations.description: Experience the breathtaking views of white-washed buildings, stunning sunsets, and crystal-clear waters in the beautiful island of Santorini.

destinations.name: Machu Picchu, Peru
destinations.description: Embark on a journey to the ancient Incan city of Machu Picchu, nestled high in the Andes mountains, offering spectacular views and rich archaeological wonders.
